mapper.select: SELECT T1.RECIPIENT_NUM AS RECEIVER , T1.DATE_CLIENT_REQ AS SEND_DATETIME , T1.CALLBACK AS SENDER FROM ATA_MMT_LOG T1 WHERE RESERVED2 = 'Wells18053' ORDER BY T1.DATE_CLIENT_REQ DESC
SELECT T1.CONN_EMAIL_ID AS RECEIVER , T1.EMAIL_START_DTM AS SEND_DATETIME , T1.SEND_USR_EMAIL AS SENDER FROM T_CMM_EMAIL_M T1 WHERE T1.TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} ORDER BY T1.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC
